title: China launches large military drills as ‘stern warning’ to Taiwan
content: The Chinese military said the exercises, which will simulate strikes on land and at sea, would serve as “a stern warning” to “Taiwan independence forces.”
summary: The Chinese military said the exercises, which will simulate strikes on land and at sea, would serve as “a stern warning” to “Taiwan independence forces.”

title: Deadly Israeli strike burns tents of displaced people at Gaza hospital
Live updates: Deadly Israeli strike sets tents ablaze on Gaza’s al-Aqsa hospital grounds
content: Israel’s military struck what it said was a Hamas command center embedded inside a hospital compound in Deir al-Balah in central Gaza early on Monday.
summary: Israel’s military struck what it said was a Hamas command center embedded inside a hospital compound in Deir al-Balah in central Gaza early on Monday.

title: Four Israeli soldiers killed in Hezbollah strike; U.S. to send antimissile system to Israel
content: Four IDF soldiers were killed and dozens were injured Sunday after a Hezbollah drone struck an IDF base in northern Israel, Israeli authorities said.

title: Pakistan’s internet slows to a crawl as suspicion falls on government
content: Tech experts and activists accuse the government of throttling the internet to suppress protests. Officials reject the allegations and offer other explanations.
summary: Tech experts and activists accuse the government of throttling the internet to suppress protests. Officials reject the allegations and offer other explanations.

title: Ukraine boosting its defense industries, with a little help from friends
content: With Europe unable to supply all the weapons and ammunition Ukraine needs, the E.U. is investing in the country’s rapidly expanding arms industry.
summary: With Europe unable to supply all the weapons and ammunition Ukraine needs, the E.U. is investing in the country’s rapidly expanding arms industry.

title: Deadly strikes in northern Gaza; Biden concerned after Israeli forces hit peacekeepers
content: At least 19 people have been killed in Jabalya amid Israel’s siege in northern Gaza. President Biden said he was asking Israel to stop firing at U.N. peacekeepers in Lebanon.
summary: At least 19 people have been killed in Jabalya amid Israel’s siege in northern Gaza. President Biden said he was asking Israel to stop firing at U.N. peacekeepers in Lebanon.

title: What is UNIFIL? The U.N. peacekeeping force in Lebanon.
What is UNIFIL, the U.N. peacekeeping force in Lebanon?
content: The U.N. Interim Force in Lebanon has been patrolling the Israel-Lebanon border for more than 46 years.

Woman attempted to kayak to Canada with bag full of protected turtles
content: Border Patrol agents in Vermont stopped the woman on the shore of Lake Wallace, on the U.S.-Canada border, with a duffel bag containing $40,000 worth of turtles.
